Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a device that helps people communicate over a distance using string connected between two cups (or similar devices).
The student can show how the device uses sound to send or receive information by drawing lines or symbols that represent sound waves traveling through the string.
The student can include details that describe the solution to the problem of communicating over a distance, such as the distance between the two students and the string connecting them.
The student can label the key parts of the device and describe how each part is important for sending and receiving sound signals.
The student can explain through the drawing how the technology (string telephone) helps people communicate and why it is important.
